post:
Dear community,

We are proud to offer you plans from our SugarVPS range. Every SugarVPS node is equipped with HW Raid 10 SATA disk array. Servers are provisioned on enterprise Citrix Xenserver platform. We present you production ready environment on stable foundations. Servers are provisioned in XEN HVM or XEN PVHVM mode. Xenserver is offering best possible client isolation. All servers are provisioned from official distribution repo. This plans are not template based. All nodes are monitored 24/7.

 

Little statistics for current month / year:

Current year have 100% uptime.

Average ticket response for current month is 4:47 min

Average solution time for current month is 17:29 min

Average ticket response for current year is 6:11 min

Average solution time for current year is 23:51 min

More about drServer.net

Family driven Sole proprietorship company based in Croatia. We have 3 permanent staff employed + 3 support contractors who operate in 3 different time zones. Staff members are all elngish speeking and they are based in Croatia, USA and Australia. drServer started selling backup servers in 2012. In 2013 we expanded our product range to production ready VPS servers. In 2014 we was #10 in LEB/LET Top providers pool. drServer operates: AbusiveCores.com, SugarVPS.com, Byteshack.net and XENstorage.com.

 

Thank you for your time reading this post and thank you for shown interest.
